body: You can subtly bolster allies' ability to misdirect and infuriate their enemies.
name: Shared Manipulation
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Elves/New Racial Rules/Half-Elven Feats/Shared Manipulation

sections.body: As a move action, you can grant all friendly creatures within 30 feet who can see or hear you a +2 bonus on Bluff or Intimidate checks (choose which skill to affect each time you use this ability) for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1 round).
sections.name: Benefit
